articles.title: Provinces Rallies Held on Kim Jong Il's Reelection
articles.content:
Provinces Rallies Held on Kim Jong Il's Reelection
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Rallies were held in South Hwanghae Province and Jagang Province on Sunday and in South Hamgyong Province and Nampho City on Monday to congratulate General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 Present at the rallies were officials of local party and power organs, economic organs and working people's organizations and people from all walks of life and youth and students. 
					
					 Speakers at the rallies stressed that Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the WPK was the greatest honor and happiness of all the members of the WPK and other people and a great auspicious event of the country and the nation. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il ensured that the party building and activities were conducted in line with the idea and intention of President Kim Il Sung, thus firmly defending the revolutionary character of the WPK, they said.
					
					 They emphasized that Kim Jong Il has perfectly accomplished the cause of perpetuating the memory of the leader for the first time in human history and performed the undying feats which will shine forever in the history of the country by leading the whole party and army and all the people. 
					
					 They called upon all the people to turn out as one in the sacred struggle for building a thriving nation, remaining loyal to the leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK in Festive Mood over Kim Jong Il's Reelection
articles.content:
DPRK in Festive Mood over Kim Jong Il's Reelection
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The news that Kim Jong Il was reelected general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea has enveloped the Democratic People's Republic of Korea in great pleasure.
					 As soon as the news was reported on Sept. 28 young people of Pyongyang gave art performances to offer heartfelt congratulations to him on his reelection, singing of the fortune of Kim Il Sung's Korea and the great honor of its people greeting a signal event of the country and the nation.
					
					 That day, youth and students gathered in different parts of the city, including the Arch of Triumph Square, to have dancing parties demonstrating their determination to strive for the prosperity of the country under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Servicepersons held a rally on Sept. 29 to strikingly display their strong will to defend Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il at the cost of their lives and definitely guarantee the building of a thriving nation with arms, remaining faithful to the Songun leadership of the WPK.
					
					 Pyongyang citizens from all walks of life, more than 150,000 in all, gathered at Kim Il Sung Square on Sept. 30 and vowed to work hard to accelerate the building of a socialist thriving nation and the revolutionary cause of Juche with a great pride of keeping Kim Jong Il at the head of the Party, the army and the state.
					
					 Youth and students, workers, peasants and women met separately to pledge to be true to the Songun revolution, closely united around Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Colorful celebrations have been held in all parts of the country, including provincial seats.

articles.title: 10-Day Film Shows Open
articles.content:
10-Day Film Shows Open
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A 10-day film show was opened with due ceremony at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday to celebrate the 65th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 To be screened during the period are documentary films on the Juche-oriented idea of party building of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and their immortal exploits.
					
					 Also to be shown are "During the Unforgettable Days", "The County Party Chief Secretary", "The Bright Morning", "Guarantee" and other feature films.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were officials of ministries and national institutions, creators and artistes in the field of film art and working people in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 Hong Kwang Sun, chairman of the State Film Commission, in his opening address referred to the immortal exploits the President performed by pioneering and leading the cause of building a revolutionary party of Juche to lay an eternal foundation of Songun Korea and the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il who developed the WPK into an invincible and iron-willed party with his extraordinary ideological and theoretical activities and dynamic revolutionary practices. 
					
					 After the ceremony the participants watched documentary film "We Will Follow You to the End of the Earth."
					
					 Similar shows opened in provinces on the same day.

articles.title: Events Marking Anniversary of WPK Held
articles.content:
Events Marking Anniversary of WPK Held
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A meeting of workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea took place at the Jonsung Square on Monday to mark the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 A report was made by Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers referred to the fact that all the people of the DPRK who greeted the great event in which General Secretary Kim Jong Il was reelected general secretary of the WPK are now significantly celebrating the 65th founding anniversary of the WPK with great national pride and self-confidence.
					
					 They recalled that President Kim Il Sung's founding of the WPK  marked a historic event which made it possible for the Korean people to bring about a radical turn in carving out their independent destiny and building a rich and powerful country, having a great political guide and genuine guardian of their destiny.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has developed the WPK into an invincible party which struggles taking the President's revolutionary idea as its guidelines and a guiding force for the Songun revolution ushering in a great heyday for the prosperity of the country, holding fast to the Songun politics as a revolutionary leadership mode, they added.
					
					 They stressed that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il led the workers of the DPRK to creditably play their role and the GFTUK to discharge its mission and role as a dependable helper and protector of the Party in every period of the development of the revolution.
					
					 On the same day, an oratorical meeting of agricultural workers was held in front of the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum on the same occasion. 
					
					 The performers at the oratorical meeting praised the WPK for its greatness and invincibility and expressed their firm resolution to remain true to the Party's Songun revolutionary leadership.

articles.title: Floral Basket from Foreigners
articles.content:
Floral Basket from Foreigners
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the economic and commercial councilors corps here on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They were handed to an official concerned on Monday by Wang Zhilin, economic and commercial councilor of the Chinese embassy here who is doyen of the corps.

articles.title: Foreigners Visit Kim Il Sung Univ.
articles.content:
Foreigners Visit Kim Il Sung Univ.
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The economic and commercial councilors' corps here visited the e-library and the indoor swimming pool of Kim Il Sung University Monday in the run-up to the 65th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The guests went round reading halls, a computer education room and a remote-controlled lecture room and other places, being briefed that the e-library was successfully built as a comprehensive educational and scientific information service centre.
					
					 Then they visited the modern swimming pool.

articles.title: Implementation of Joint Declarations Called for
articles.content:
Implementation of Joint Declarations Called for
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The Korean Social Democratic Party and the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea released a joint statement Monday on the occasion of the third anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration "Declaration for Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity".
					 The two parties in the statement stressed the need to regard the inter-Korean joint declarations as the immutable reunification programmes, firmly support, defend and implement them despite any change in the situation and make utmost efforts to save the inter-Korean relations from the present collapse. 
					
					 The two parties will conduct a positive peace movement against war in order to foil the reckless war maneuvers of the warmongers at home and abroad and build a peace-keeping regime on the Korean Peninsula this year, the third anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration, at a time when the military confrontation and the danger of war are escalating on the peninsula as the days go by, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The two parties will categorically reject the outsiders' interference in the internal issues of the Korean nation and their obstructions and boost solidarity and cooperation in the efforts for independent reunification and the interests and prosperity common to the nation in the idea of "By our nation itself", the basic spirit of the inter-Korean joint declarations.
					
					 The present stern reality goes to prove that acts of negating and going against the inter-Korean joint declarations will create only distrust and confrontation between compatriots and the prospect of national prosperity can hardly be expected.
					
					 We ardently call upon all the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and abroad to turn out as one in a nationwide struggle to defend and implement the inter-Korean joint declarations, aware that the destiny of the nation hinges on the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Concerted Efforts for Implementing Declarations Called for
articles.content:
Concerted Efforts for Implementing Declarations Called for
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The North, South and Overseas Side Committees for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration issued a joint resolution Monday on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration.
					 The resolution said that the historic June summit in 2000 and the Pyongyang summit in 2007 which culminated in the adoption of the "Declaration for Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity" were events of national significance as they advanced the June 15 era of reunification on a higher stage.
					
					 After the publication of the October 4 declaration the north and the south witnessed an era of national reconciliation, cooperation, peace and reunification in the political, economic, military, cultural and all other fields something unprecedented in the history of division, the resolution noted, and went on:
					
					 We will preserve and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration to independently reunify the country by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.
					
					 We will firmly protect the independent dignity and interests of the nation and resolutely stand up against foreign forces' unreasonable interference and arbitrary practices.
					
					 We will take the lead in the struggle to reject all acts of inciting confrontation between fellow countrymen and protect peace.
					
					 We will reject all the hostile acts of fostering confrontation and war within the nation and make positive efforts to completely defuse the danger of a war and build a lasting peace-keeping regime on this land.
					
					 We will boost the unity with all political parties, organizations and personages at home and abroad aspiring after national reconciliation, peace and reunification.
					
					 The resolution called on all the Koreans to turn out as one in the patriotic movement for reunification for implementing the inter-Korean declarations with firm confidence and optimism about national reunification and pave a new way for achieving peace and reunification by the concerted efforts of all the Koreans.

articles.title: Seminar Held to Commemorate DPRK's Proposal
articles.content:
Seminar Held to Commemorate DPRK's Proposal
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A seminar was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday to commemorate the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK) advanced by President Kim Il Sung.
					 Speeches were made by Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party, Kim Wan Su, director of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea, An Kyong Ho, director of the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea, and others.
					
					 The speakers noted that the proposal for founding the DFRK clarified by Kim Il Sung at the 6th Congress of the WPK is the most just and original one of great significance as it brought about a landmark phase in the efforts for independent reunification.
					
					 They referred to the fact that the proposal correctly reflects the nature of the issue of Korea's reunification and its specific realities. 
					
					 It was a noteworthy event in the history of national reunification that General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided a new landmark for achieving it by federal formula in the June 15 joint declaration, they noted, adding that this was because the joint declaration not only made it clear that it serves as a common groundwork acceptable to the north and the south in the way of realizing the proposal for achieving reunification by federal formula and both sides are heading for reunification by federal formula but made a scientific clarification of the co-relations between the north and the south and their mode of existence.
					
					 It is a fundamental guarantee for the founding of the DFRK to achieve national unity, they stressed. 
					
					 They called upon all the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and overseas to wage a vigorous struggle to successfully carry out the instructions of Kim Il Sung and thus achieve national reunification, cherished desire of the nation, as soon as possible true to the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Photo Exhibitions Mark Chopin's Birthday
articles.content:
Photo Exhibitions Mark Chopin's Birthday
  Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibition opened with due ceremony at the Pyongyang Centre for Cultural Exchange with Foreign Countries on Monday to mark the 200th birth anniversary of Chopin, Polish musician. 
					 Present there were Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, officials concerned, working people in the city, Edward Pietrzyk, Polish ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of the Polish embassy here. 
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys of different countries and officials of embassies of foreign countries here. 
					
					 Speeches were made there. 
					
					 Participants looked round photographs dealing with life and creative activities of Chopin and other photos. 
					
					 Earlier, similar photo exhibition took place at the Kangwon Provincial Art Exhibition on August 26 and 27.

articles.title: Book about Kim Il Sung's Comrades-in-arms Off Press
articles.content:
Book about Kim Il Sung's Comrades-in-arms Off Press
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The Science and Encyclopedia Publishing House of Korea has recently brought out a book "Leader and Revolutionary Comrades-in-arms".
					 In the first part, titled "Revolutionary Comrade Closest to the Great Leader" the book deals with revolutionary activities of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk who defended Kim Il Sung politically and ideologically and at the risk of her life and devoted her whole life to the liberation of the country and the building of a new country.
					
					 The book introduces Kim Il Sung's revolutionary comrades who devoted their all to the country and the people under the titles "Those Who Ushered in New History of Unity at Cost of Blood", "Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Fighters", "Revolutionary Comrades-in-arms in Period of State Building", "Revolutionary Comrades-in-arms in Wartime", "Officials Who Contributed to Socialist Construction" and "Revolutionaries Who Dedicated Themselves to National Reunification".  It also introduces his internationalist friends.

articles.title: Sea Turtle Marked with Ring Discovered
articles.content:
Sea Turtle Marked with Ring Discovered
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A turtle marked with a ring was discovered in the East Sea of Korea off the Sinchang Workers' District in Pukchong County, South Hamgyong Province, in September. 
					 It, weighing about 10kg, has a plastic ring, one centimeter wide and 5 centimeters long, in its left leg.
					
					 Up to now ringed birds have been found in the country several times but it was the first time to find a ringed turtle. Now experts are studying the turtle.
					
					 Officials of the Nature Conservation Union of Korea told KCNA that the discovery was probably attributable to the ecological environment of the Korean coastal waters turning favorable for sea animals and that they would invigorate exchange with the International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN) and nature conservation organizations of other countries.

articles.title: US Moves for New War Flailed
articles.content:
US Moves for New War Flailed
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. moves to step up the arms sale to south Korea is a very dangerous act of upsetting the balance of forces in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia and egging the south Korean warmongers on to ignite a new war, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a signed commentary.
					 This proves that the U.S. is not interested in detente and peace on the Korean Peninsula at all but is only keen on escalating tension and launching a new war, the news analyst says.
					
					 This is clearly evidenced by the recent joint anti-submarine exercises staged by the U.S., the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The ceaseless war exercises being staged by the U.S. imperialists against the DPRK in league with the south Korean warhawks are reckless moves to bring the hostile relations between the DPRK and the U.S. and the north-south relations to an extreme phase and provoke a war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost.
					
					 The U.S. is the arch criminal straining the situation and working hard to spark off a war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It is a strategic error and foolish acts of the U.S. to seek to overwhelm someone with military hysteria and realize its wild ambition for aggression.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to face up to the need of the times aspiring after peace against the use of force and behave with discretion.

articles.title: S. Korea Accused of Staging Ridiculous Ruckus
articles.content:
S. Korea Accused of Staging Ridiculous Ruckus
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A few days ago the south Korean authorities staged a ridiculous ruckus called "commemoration of the day of recovery of Seoul" in Seoul with their chief executive and "government" and military officials concerned and former mercenaries of the U.S. imperialists involved as part of their anti- DPRK burlesque marking the lapse of six decades since the outbreak of the Korean war. At the confrontation charade timed to coincide with an event commemorating "the day of ROK Army," an annual event taking place on October 1, warmongers let loose such provocative remarks against the DPRK as describing the "Cheonan" case as a "provocation from the north" and "infiltration and provocation by asymmetric combat power."
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The above-said farce is nothing but another politically motivated grave provocation against the DPRK as it is aimed at covering their crime-woven history and fanning up extreme antipathy and atmosphere of confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 The saber-rattling being staged to invade the DPRK against the backdrop of the above-mentioned anti-DPRK charade is premeditated moves intended to hamstring its efforts to improve the inter-Korean relations, strain the situation and ignite a war, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly wish to mend the inter-Korean relations, they should stop all their provocations getting on the nerves of the DPRK and aggravating the situation and opt for achieving national reconciliation and unity and repairing the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities will not be able to escape a stern punishment by history if they escalate the tension and hamstring the efforts to improve the inter-Korean relations, swimming against the trend of the times.

articles.title: Anniversary of Adoption of Oct. 4 Declaration Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Adoption of Oct. 4 Declaration Marked
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A North-South Summit was held in Pyongyang and a declaration for the development of the inter-Korean relations and peace and prosperity was adopted in October three years ago. This marked a noteworthy event as it provided guidelines for ushering in a new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity by expanding and developing the inter-Korean relations on the basis of the June 15 joint declaration. 
					Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in an editorial.
					
					 The adoption of the declaration helped lay a practical foundation for developing the inter-Korean relations and achieving peace on the Korean Peninsula and prosperity common to the nation and provided the Korean nation with a militant banner to be held aloft for attaining the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, the editorial notes, and goes on:  
					
					 The reality of the movement for national reunification in the past three years goes to prove that the inter-Korean relations can improve and the country can be reunified and the nation can have a rosy future only when the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are respected and implemented and that it is possible to accelerate the advance of the era of independent reunification only through a united struggle of all Koreans. 
					
					 The adoption of the October 4 declaration and the past three years imbued the Koreans with the conviction that the hope-filled day of national reunification will come before long thanks to General Secretary Kim Jong Il's idea of independent reunification and his firm will to fling open the gate to reunification by the concerted efforts of the Koreans. 
					
					 How to approach the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration serves as a touchstone distinguishing inter-Korean harmony from confrontation and peace from war.
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK to improve the inter-Korean relations and achieve independent reunification, peace and prosperity on the basis of the declarations. 
					
					 The DPRK will make positive efforts to develop the inter-Korean relations according to the declarations and resolutely counter any act going against the joint declarations in the future, too.
					
					The inter-Korean relations can never improve as long as the south Korean authorities persistently pursue the policy of confrontation, while denying the declarations.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should roll back the anti-reunification "policy toward the north" and opt to respect the declarations and mend the relations.
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south and overseas should carve out their independent destiny with the courage and pluck of the Korean nation, deeply aware of their mission before the times and history.

articles.title: Full Play to Might of Single-Minded Unity Called for
articles.content:
Full Play to Might of Single-Minded Unity Called for
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The revolutionary surge in the DPRK at present which is effecting changes in all fields, working miracles without knowing impossibilities, means a great surge, a product of the single-minded unity. This means the power and victory of the DPRK. Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in an editorial article.
					 The single-minded unity of the DPRK has a long history and it has steadily grown stronger in the annals of the revolution, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Korean revolution has always emerged victorious thanks to the unity of the Korean people in thinking and purpose and moral obligation based on the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il. The single-minded unity has grown exceptionally strong as it helped the entire party, army and people turn into a harmonious whole based on the monolithic ideology, faith and comradely love and sense of obligation in the era of Songun.
					
					 The harmonious whole of the leader, the party, the army and the people serves as a basic cornerstone of the state political system in the DPRK, basic roots of its society and a source for all the victories and miracles. The single-minded unity of the DPRK is the strongest revolutionary unity in history and an all-powerful treasured sword for winning only victory in any adversity. The invincible spirit of Songun Korea lies in that all the servicepersons and people form a community in which they share the common destiny with the leader and carve out a future of prosperity. 
					
					 The single-minded unity of the DPRK is growing stronger in the historic advance for building a great prosperous and powerful nation of Juche under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 This solid unity is based on the perfect unity among the leader, the army and the people in thinking and faith and has its source in the ardent longing and fascination of the army and people with the leader and it has become unbreakable despite the tempest of the times. 
					
					 The single-minded unity of the DPRK has demonstrated its might in the general advance to open the gate to a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 "When Korea Is Determined, It Can Do Anything!" The shout of this slogan now heard from every worksite for building a thriving nation represents the firm faith of the army and people of the DPRK that they have nothing to fear and can do anything as long as they are led by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The DPRK is sure to always emerge victorious as it has the single-mindedly united ranks heroically advancing, performing matchless miracles and exploits in hearty response to the patriotic call of the leader.

articles.title: Thorough Implementation of Oct. 4 Declaration Called for
articles.content:
Thorough Implementation of Oct. 4 Declaration Called for
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The Academic Headquarters and the Media Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a joint academic seminar in Seoul on September 30 on the occasion of the third anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration.
					 Speeches were made at the seminar to be followed by the publication of a resolution.
					
					 The resolution said that the present inter-Korean relations were brought back to those in the past era of confrontation, adding that had the authorities thoroughly implemented the October 4 declaration, such painful developments as what Koreans see at present would not have happened. 
					
					 In order to denuclearize the Korean Peninsula the U.S. should lift the unreasonable sanctions against the DPRK and the Lee Myung Bak regime should stop the moves to escalate the confrontation with it, the resolution held.
					
					 It urged the authorities to actively come out to resume the tour of Mt. Kumgang and the Kaesong area and achieve peace on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Anniversary of Oct. 4 Declaration Marked in Japan
articles.content:
Anniversary of Oct. 4 Declaration Marked in Japan
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A meeting marking the third anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration was held in Tokyo on September 30 under the sponsorship of the Japanese Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration.
					 Present there were So Chung On, director of the International Affairs and Reunification Department of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), officials of Chongryon, compatriots of different circles and members of the Japanese Regional Committee.
					
					 Kwak Tong Ui, chairman of the committee, said in his speech that the October 4 declaration is a programme for comprehensively implementing the June 15 joint declaration and a banner greatly encouraging the Koreans in the efforts to achieve independent development and reunification.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad have demonstrated the ardent desire of the nation for reunification and developed the reunification movement into a nationwide patriotic movement, centering around All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration, he said, stressing that this is a manifestation of the validity and vitality of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 He denounced the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea for totally denying the declarations and bringing back the favorably developing inter-Korean relations to those in the times before the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, pursuant to the policy for escalating the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 He called upon all the people to conduct a more dynamic movement for national reunification under the uplifted banner of "By our nation itself" in order to usher in the era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 Introduced at the meeting were solidarity messages from the North Side Committee, and the Chinese, European and U.S. Regional Committees of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration.
					
					 A resolution was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 Meanwhile, a lecture was given on the situation of the Korean Peninsula and the future of the Korean nation.

articles.title: British Organizations Congratulate Kim Jong Il's Reelection
articles.content:
British Organizations Congratulate Kim Jong Il's Reelection
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of the Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Sept. 28 congratulating General Secretary     Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The statement extended the sincerest congratulations to Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the WPK.
					
					 It is a great event in accomplishing the Songun revolutionary cause that Kim Jong Il was reelected as general secretary of the WPK at a time when the DPRK, bulwark of Songun, is standing in acute confrontation with the U.S. imperialists and their allies, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 Thanks to his leadership, the DPRK has firmly protected its dignity and the destiny of world socialism.
					
					 His reelection is an expression of boundless trust and intense loyalty of all the party members, the servicepersons and the people to him.
					
					 The DPRK is the only country in the world that is united as firm as a rock.
					
					 It is our firm belief that Kim Jong Il would accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche started by President Kim Il Sung by wisely leading the party, the army and the people in the general advance for achieving the final victory of socialism and the reunification of the country.
					
					 Only victory and glory are in store for the Korean people under the leadership of illustrious commander of Songun Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Italy
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's famous work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was brought out in booklet by the Group of the Dialectical Materialists of Italy on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the WPK.
					 The work, published on Oct. 2, Juche 84 (1995), reviews with high pride the glorious history of the WPK in which it paved a new way of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, and serves as an immortal great programme for the building of the party and its activities that indicates the road of developing the Party into a great Kim Il Sung's party for eternity.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia la funcion artistica de la Unidad 10215
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia la funcion artistica de la Unidad 10215 
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio junto con los oficiales y soldados del EPC la funcion del grupo de propaganda artistica de la Unidad 10215 del EPC.
					 Los ejecutantes pusieron en la escena el coro femenino "Fortuna de Corea", el solo masculino y pangchang "Anoramos su sonrisa de sol", el solo femenino "Cantemos el partido", el duo de poesia y solo de guitarra de bajo "Que conquisten la cumbre de la tecnologia de punta" y la narracion poetica "Seremos eterno satelite del sol" y otras piezas.
					
					  Mediante la funcion, ellos mostraron bien el poderio del invencible EPC formado como ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu en el regazo del gran comandante distinguido del Songun, la ferrea conviccion y voluntad de los militares del EPC de  defender a costa de la vida la Direccion de la Revolucion y llevar a feliz termino con las armas la causa revolucionaria del Juche siguiendo siempre a la direccion del partido.
					
					  El Dirigente felicito los exitos logrados en la funcion respondiendo cordialmente con la mano a las efusivas aclamaciones de los ejecutantes y espectadores.
					
					  Dio agradecimiento a los miembros del grupo de propaganda artistica de la Unidad expresando gran satisfaccion de que estos hayan ofrecido la excelente funcion de alto caracter ideo-artistico con las obras de gran significado cognoscitivo y educativo que reflejan sincera y vividamente el infinito poderio espiritual y el noble rasgo moral del ejercito revolucionario que avanza a pasos firmes lleno de optimismo y entusiasmo con la firme concepcion del lider y la de revolucion.
					
					  El Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas que sirven de guia en fortalecer las actividades de propaganda artistica de caracter revolucionario y combativo.
					
					  El Dirigente fue acompanado en verla por Kim Ki Nam y Hong Sok Hyong, miembros del Buro Politico (BP) y secretarios del CC del PTC; Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del BP y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC; Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC; U Tong Chuk, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y miembro de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Kim Chang Sop, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC, el general de ejercito del EPC Yun Jong Rin, miembro de la CMC del PTC y otros miembros de mando del ejercito y organos de las fuerzas armadas.

articles.title: Acto por el Dia de Fundacion de Corea
articles.content:
Acto por el Dia de Fundacion de Corea
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 3 ante el Mausoleo de Tangun (fundador de Corea) el acto por el Dia de la Fundacion de Corea.
					 Al acto asistieron Kim Yong Dae, presidente del Consejo por la Reconciliacion Nacional y del CC del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea, Ryu Mi Yong, presidenta del Consejo por la Reunificacion de la Nacion de Tangun y del CC del Partido Chondoista Chong-u, Kang Ryon Hak, miembro de la presidencia del CC del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria, An Kyong Ho, director del Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria y otros funcionarios junto con trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					 Tambien, estuvieron presentes los coreanos en ultramar quienes permanecen en la patria socialista.
					
					 Tras la ceremonia en recordacion de Tangun, Ri Ok Se, vicepresidente del Consejo por la Reunificacion de la Nacion de Tangun presento el informe de la ocasion.
					
					El rindio sublime homenaje al Presidente          Kim Il Sung quien hizo encubrir como persona real a Tangun que durante largo tiempo se habia transmitido como mito y construir con magnanimidad el Mausoleo de Tangun conforme al prestigio del mausoleo del fundador de la nacion y dio calido agradecimiento al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Enfatizo que todos, quienes tienen la sangre y el alma de la nacion de Tangun, deben levantarse activamente en la lucha por preservar la paz del pais y defender la seguridad de la nacion.
					
					 Todos los coreanos deben librar energicamente la lucha por abrir con las fuerzas unidas de la nacion la nueva epoca de la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad bajo la bandera de la historica Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur y lograr lo mas pronto posible la causa de la reunificacion de la patria, finalizo.

articles.title: PSD y POD llaman a ejecutar declaraciones conjuntas
articles.content:
PSD y POD llaman a ejecutar declaraciones conjuntas 
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Partido Social-Democrata de Corea y el Partido de Obreros Democraticos del Sur de Corea hicieron publica el dia 4 una declaracion conjunta con motivo del III aniversario de la publicacion de la "Declaracion para el Desarrollo de las Relaciones Norte-Sur, la Paz y la Prosperidad" (Declaracion del 4 de Octubre).
					 El documento senala que los dos partidos presentaran las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur como programas inconmovibles de reunificacion, las apoyaran firmemente y las ejecutaran sin vacilacion ante cualquier cambio de la situacion y haran ingentes esfuerzos por eliminar la actual situacion catastrofica de las relaciones Norte-Sur y continua:
					
					 A medida que se aumentan cada dia mas el enfrentamiento militar y el peligro de la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, los dos partidos desarrollaran mas activamente este ano del tercer aniversario de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre el movimiento por la paz contra los temerarios alborotos de guerra de las fuerzas belicistas internas y externas y para establecer el sistema de paz de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					 Conforme al ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", espiritu fundamental de las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur, los dos partidos rechazaran estrictamente las maniobras de estorbo e intervencion de las fuerzas foraneas en los asuntos internos, ampliaran y fortaleceran la solidaridad y cooperacion por la reunificacion independiente, los intereses y la prosperidad comunes de la nacion.
					
					  La rigurosa realidad de hoy demuestra que si niegan las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur y marchan a contrapelo de estas, se crearan solo la desconfianza y el enfrentamiento entre los connacionales y no podran esperar ni el futuro de la prosperidad nacional.
					
					  Llamamos fervientemente a todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar, con la conciencia de que el destino de la nacion depende de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, a levantarse como un solo hombre en la lucha pannacional por defender y ejecutar las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur.

articles.title: Coreanos del Norte, Sur y ultramar publican resolucion conjunta
articles.content:
Coreanos del Norte, Sur y ultramar publican resolucion conjunta
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ATCC) -- En ocasion del III aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, los Comites de las partes nortena, surena y ultramarina para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio hicieron publica el dia 4 la resolucion conjunta.
					 Luego del historico encuentro de junio de 2000 volvio a realizarse en 2007 el encuentro cumbre Norte-Sur de Pyongyang y fue aprobada la "Declaracion para el Desarrollo de las Relaciones Norte-Sur, la Paz y la Prosperidad", lo cual fue un historico evento nacional que llevo a la etapa mas alta el avance de la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio, senala el documento.
					
					 Despues de publicada la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, el Norte y el Sur de Corea abrieron de par en par la epoca de la reconciliacion, la cooperacion, la paz y la reunificacion de la nacion, sin precedente en todas las esferas politica, economica, militar, cultural, etc. despues de la division del pais, subraya y continua:
					
					 Mantendremos y ejecutaremos la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y lograremos la reunificacion independiente uniendo las fuerzas de la nacion.
					
					 Defenderemos estrictamente la dignidad independiente e intereses de la nacion y nos opondremos resueltamente a la injusta intervencion y las arbitrariedades de las fuerzas foraneas.
					
					  Rechazaremos todos los actos que fomenten el enfrentamiento entre los connacionales y pondremos a la cabeza de la lucha por la paz.
					
					  Condenamos todos los actos hostiles que acarrean el enfrentamiento y la guerra a la nacion y nos esforzaremos activamente por eliminar completamente el peligro de la guerra en este territorio y establecer el duradero sistema de paz.
					
					  Fortaleceremos mas la unidad con todos los partidos politicos, entidades y personalidades en el interior y exterior del pais que aspiran la reconciliacion nacional, la paz y la reunificacion.
					
					  Finalmente, el documento exhorta a todos a levantarse como un solo hombre en el movimiento patriotico de reunificacion por la ejecucion de las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur, con la firme conviccion y el optimismo sobre la reunificacion de la patria y abrir con las fuerzas unidas de la nacion la nueva salida de la paz y la reunificacion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena pretensiones de EE.UU. de desatar nueva guerra
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena pretensiones de EE.UU. de desatar nueva guerra
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ATCC) -- Un comentario individual publicado hoy por el periodico Rodong Sinmun califico la exportacion de armas de Estados Unidos al Sur de Corea de un acto muy peligroso que destruye el equilibrio de las fuerzas militares en la Peninsula Coreana y la region del Nordeste Asiatico e incita a los belicistas surcoreanos a la provocacion de la nueva guerra.
					La venta de armas demuestra que EE.UU. no tiene ningun interes en el alivio de la tension ni en el aseguramiento de la paz de la Peninsula Coreana, sino se dedica unicamente a agravar la tension y provocar la nueva guerra, senalo el comentarista y continuo:
					
					En el mismo contexto, EE.UU. volvio a ejecutar el entrenamiento conjunto antisubmarinos contra la RPDC junto con los belicistas surcoreanos para agravar al maximo las relaciones hostiles entre la RPDC y EE.UU. y las intercoreanas y provocar a toda costa una nueva guerra en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					EE.UU. es la causa de la tensa situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y de la nueva guerra.
					
					El intento del imperio de presionar a alguien con sus aventuras militares y realizar su ambicion de agredir es un error estrategico y una estupidez.
					
					EE.UU. debe actuar con prudencia calando la exigencia de la epoca sobre la paz y el no uso de las fuerzas.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena provocacion politica del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena provocacion politica del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ATCC) -- Hace unos dias, en ocasion del 60 aniversario de la  guerra coreana, las autoridades surcoreanas desarrollaron en Seul, como un eslabon de la farsa contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el acto por la "conmemoracion del rescate de Seul" bajo la participacion del gobernante, las autoridades "gubernamentales" y militares e incluso de los ex - mercenarios de los imperialistas norteamericanos.
					 En esta actividad que se realizo a la vez con el acto del "dia del ejercito nacional", que se ejecutaba el 1 de octubre de cada ano, acusaron a la RPDC calificando el caso de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan" de "provocacion del Norte" y de "penetracion por las fuerzas asimetricas".
					
					 Esto deviene otra grave provocacion politica contra la RPDC encaminada a encubrir su historia criminal y promover la extrema hostilidad y el ambiente de enfrentamiento contra los connacionales.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 4 y continua:
					
					  Tales alborotos anti-RPDC, que se desarrollan en el Sur de Corea, devienen las premeditadas maniobras para poner freno a los esfuerzos de la RPDC por la mejora de las relaciones con el Sur y provocar la guerra empeorando la situacion.
					
					  Si las autoridades surcoreanas desean de veras la mejora de las relaciones con el Norte, deben cesar de inmediato todos los actos provocativos para incitar la RPDC y agravar la situacion,  y dirigirse a la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales y a la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					  Si las autoridades surcoreanas agravan la tension y obstaculizan la mejora de las relaciones bilaterales nadando a contrapelo de la corriente de la epoca, no podran evitar la severa sentencia de la historia.
